improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero.  The variable 'x' is decremented to 0 in the for loop, leading to a division by zero error in line 9. Add a check to ensure x is not zero before the division operation.

Unreachable code. The for loop will always execute 10 times and after this the value of x will be 0. Then, y = 1/x will raise an error because x will be 0. The code after line 8 is unreachable due to the exception.
